creditline: Gift of David L. and Mary M.D. Parker
description: color photo montage; interior of a car with close-up of a woman and a man's faces and two hands, with blue skin, at left; older man wearing glasses, green striped shirt, and green pants, with blue skin, driving car; pink trees and houses beyond car windows; blue dashboard with pink knobs and controls; black borders
signed: LLC in white: Sandy Skoglund \'86 20/25 Pink and Blue Car
title: Pink and Blue Car
